data.title: Register User
data.text:
ViacomCBS Password Policy

All user and system-level passwords must contain 8-16 characters.

The password must contain characters from the below five categories:

English uppercase characters (A - Z).

English lowercase characters (a - z).

Base 10 digits (0 - 9).

Non-alphanumeric (For example:!, $, #, or %)

The password cannot contain three or more characters in sequence from the user's account name.

All user and system-level passwords must be changed at least every 90 days.

All user and system-level login IDâ€™s will be disabled after 5 incorrect password login attempts.

Account lockout duration must be at least 30 minutes.

Account lockout counter must be reset after 30 minutes.

When transmitting any password protected document via email or instant messaging, the password must be communicated verbally

Transmitting passwords via email or instant message is strictly prohibited.
